[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/heft](./heft.md) &gt; [IApiExtractorConfiguration](./heft.iapiextractorconfiguration.md)

## IApiExtractorConfiguration interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IApiExtractorConfiguration 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [useProjectTypescriptVersion](./heft.iapiextractorconfiguration.useprojecttypescriptversion.md) | boolean | If set to true, use the project's TypeScript compiler version for API Extractor's analysis. API Extractor's included TypeScript compiler can generally correctly analyze typings generated by older compilers, and referencing the project's compiler can cause issues. If issues are encountered with API Extractor's included compiler, set this option to true.<!-- -->This corresponds to API Extractor's <code>--typescript-compiler-folder</code> CLI option and <code>IExtractorInvokeOptions.typescriptCompilerFolder</code> API option. This option defaults to false. |
